EmailTemplate.subject: Newly announced speakers for Forum 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Boston + Virtual | July 20-22, 2022
Our roster of global leaders who will present at Forum 2022 continues to grow—making it the top destination for anyone interested in virtual care.
Explore topics such as caring for an aging population, achieving health equity, virtual care policy updates and more. Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=general-6&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> to be part of the conversation!
FEATURED SPEAKERS Ken Yale, DDS, JD, DS Chief Executive TRICARE Health Plan
Beth Kreofsky, MBA Operations Manager Mayo Clinic
David Rhew, MD Global Chief Medical Officer & Vice President of Healthcare Microsoft Corporation Hotel block closes soon Don’t wait! Register by June 28 to take advantage of our Forum room rate at the Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport. After you register, watch for an email with a link to book your hotel room as part of our block.
Image Boston seaport
Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=general-6&utm_campaign=forum-22]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
